reviewText: I was looking for a CHuggington Video for my son and thought i had found a good one. This video is in UK English not USA English. My son won't watch it because "they sound werid". Wish I would have known this before I bought this video as I would not have bought it.
bought for my nephew, he loves thomas and didn't know it then but he also loves chuggington!  i haven't watched it myself but he sure loves it, so i highly recommend
